instructions_for_new_agent: Copy the files listed in themes.source_files and layouts.source_files from this project (lm-studio-ui) into your new project, preserving the path under src/. Then wire themes and layouts into your new app using the store_keys and integration_notes. Do NOT copy or use any voice, microphone, or chat input code from this project; that is broken. Build your own chat/input in the new project.

themes.description: UI color themes: root has data-ui-theme='<value>'. CSS variables in app.css under [data-ui-theme="..."] and .dark[data-ui-theme="..."].
themes.extract_from_stores: Copy only the uiTheme and theme writables and their localStorage subscribe logic. Do not copy the entire stores.js; merge these into your new project's store module.
themes.theme_options_list: themeOptions.js exports UI_THEME_OPTIONS: array of { value, label }. Values include: atom, default, cyberpunk, neural, quantum, arctic, neon, mint, coral, highcontrast, cybercitrus, industrialhazard, fireice, hacker, medical, radioactivelab, coppercircuit, arcticneon, sunsetgradient, racingstripe, jungleterminal, magmaflow, chromeglass, toxicwaste, oceandeep.
themes.integration_notes: Apply uiTheme to document: document.documentElement.dataset.uiTheme = value. Subscribe uiTheme to persist to localStorage and set dataset. Theme CSS in app.css starts around line 245 (/* UI theme variables */) and defines [data-ui-theme="default"], [data-ui-theme="cyberpunk"], etc. with --ui-bg-main, --ui-accent, --ui-text-primary, etc.

layouts.description: Two layouts: cockpit (single chat + optional Intel panel) and arena (1-4 model columns, DashboardArena). Layout switcher in header; effectiveModelId = arena ? dashboardModelA : selectedModelId.
layouts.extract_from_stores: Copy from stores.js: OLD_TO_NEW_LAYOUT, getInitialLayout(), layout writable, dashboardModelA/B/C/D writables, effectiveModelId derived, cockpitIntelOpen writable, arenaPanelCount writable, and their localStorage subscribe/persist logic. Merge into your new project's store module; do not copy the entire file.
layouts.stores_snippet: Layout: writable('cockpit'|'arena'), persisted in localStorage key 'layout'. Old layout values (flow, splitbrain, etc.) migrate to cockpit; 'dashboard' migrates to arena. dashboardModelA/B/C/D: writable(modelId), localStorage keys dashboardModelA etc. effectiveModelId: derived([layout, dashboardModelA, selectedModelId], (layout, a, sid) => layout === 'arena' && a ? a : sid). cockpitIntelOpen: writable(true). arenaPanelCount: writable(1..4).
layouts.integration_notes: App.svelte: LAYOUT_OPTS = [{ value: 'cockpit', label: 'Cockpit' }, { value: 'arena', label: 'Arena' }]. Header has nav buttons that call layout.set(opt.value). Main content: {#if layout === 'cockpit'} render cockpit (ConvoRail, ChatView, optional IntelPanel); {:else if layout === 'arena'} render arena header (panel count 1-4, ModelSelectorSlot A/B/C/D), then DashboardArena. Copy the layout-related blocks from App.svelte (header layout switcher and the two branches). DashboardArena and ModelSelectorSlot are used by arena layout only. WARNING: DashboardArena.svelte imports ChatInput from this project; in your new project replace that with your own chat/input componentâ€”do not use this project's ChatInput.

do_not_copy: Any microphone, voice, speech recognition, or Send-button logic
